name: TheSnowBriefSnowbird
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Snow Brief for Snowbird will keep you in the know so that you don't miss out on an epic powder day. Get our brief in the morning with your daily news to see if today is the day to call out from work and jet up Little Cottonwood Canyon!

You will get:
- powder day alert
- new snow report
- open run report
- quick forecast report
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
